column5: I am looking for a shut off valve or T that I can use to run between my main and kicker,any one have a any good ideas,I want something that will work.
like this Al? Brass 3 Way Fuel Selector Valve
Why not take it to the next level and put in a marine fuel filter??? Then no need for 3 way.  Slayer.
yes, along that line, i guess any automotive store or ctc would have something.
there is a fuel filter installed,i was looking,there is another outlet on it,but would I not need a valve to shut off one of the lines ?
WJ, I run both the 115 & 9.9 of the filter without any valves. Just make sure you are connecting to the output vs. input.  Slayer.

ok, sounds simple, i ll look again, but i know there is 1 inlet and two outlets,will double check. I was reading on some other sites,about when one engine is running it sucks the fuel line dry on the other one and things of that nature.  thanks pike
